data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 3, Free kick Pohang Steelers.
In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sangju Sangmu's Kwon Kyung-won gets in a shot on goal at Pohang Steel Yard. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 6, Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Kim Woo-sung signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
In the minute 9, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu.
In Pohang Sangju Sangmu drive forward through Park Yong-woo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 13, Sangju Sangmu drives forward and Oh Hyeon-gyu gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goal kick for Sangju Sangmu at Pohang Steel Yard.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 15, Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
The match at Pohang Steel Yard has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kim Sang-won, who is down injured.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Pohang Steelers's Kim Sang-won is back in action after a slight knock.
Pohang Steelers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
In the minute 24, Sangju Sangmu have a dangerous throw-in.
Sangju Sangmu pushes forward through Jeong Jae-Hee, whose finish on goal is saved.
Pohang Steelers's Manuel Palacios misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 25, Kim Woo-sung awards Sangju Sangmu a goal kick.
Aleksandar Palocevic puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
That's a fine assist from Lee Seung-mo.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 31, Kim Woo-sung signals a Pohang Steelers throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half.
Goal! Aleksandar Palocevic extends Pohang Steelers's lead to 2-0.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers just outside Sangju Sangmu's area.
In the minute 38, Can Sangju Sangmu capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
At Pohang Steel Yard, Jeon Min-kwang is shown a red card and sent off.
Important block from the Pohang Steelers defence as Kwon Kyung-won fires in a strike for Sangju Sangmu.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 42, Pohang Steelers needs to be cautious. Sangju Sangmu have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
Throw-in for Sangju Sangmu in the half of Pohang Steelers.
In the minute 45, Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 45, Lee Sang-ki for Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 45, Sangju Sangmu are coming forward and Ju-Sung Woo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Kim Woo-sung awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Kwon Kyung-won (Sangju Sangmu) has received a yellow card from Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Pohang Steel Yard.
Seon-min Moon is replacing Lee Sang-ki for the away team.
Kim Bo-seob of Sangju Sangmu gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
Pohang Steelers's Aleksandar Palocevic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pohang.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in the half of Sangju Sangmu.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 51, Shim Dong-un for Pohang Steelers drives towards goal at Pohang Steel Yard. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Seon-min Moon of Sangju Sangmu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sangju Sangmu have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
In the minute 54, Kim Woo-sung signals a throw-in for Sangju Sangmu, close to Pohang Steelers's area.
Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Sangju Sangmu in their own half.
In the minute 55, At Pohang Steel Yard, Manuel Palacios has been yellow-carded for the home team.
An attacking Sangju Sangmu player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Lee Seung-mo (Pohang Steelers) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 58, Kim Kwang-seok is replacing Oh Beom-seok for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
Kim Tae-wan (Sangju Sangmu) is making a second substitution, with Lee Keun-ho replacing Oh Hyeon-gyu.
Seon-min Moon's penalty pulls one back for Sangju Sangmu at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 60, Jeong Jae-Hee (Sangju Sangmu) nets with a header to make it 2-2 at Pohang Steel Yard.
Great play from Ahn Tae-hyeon to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Sangju Sangmu.
In the minute 63, Sangju Sangmu have been given a penalty...
Kim Sang-won is booked for the home team.
Seon-min Moon (Sangju Sangmu) has missed a penalty!
In the minute 65, Kim Woo-sung awards the home team a throw-in.
Pohang Steelers awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Pohang Steelers in Pohang.
In the minute 67, In Pohang Pohang Steelers attack through Shim Dong-un. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Free kick for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
In the minute 71, Pohang Steelers have a goal kick.
The home team replace Shim Dong-un with Song Min-kyu.
Seon-min Moon of Sangju Sangmu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sangju Sangmu will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pohang Steelers.
Goal! A Song Min-kyu header gives Pohang Steelers a 3-2 lead in Pohang.
In the minute 74, Kang Sang-woo with an assist there.
Manuel Palacios (Pohang Steelers) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Pohang Steelers to take a throw-in in Sangju Sangmu territory.
In the minute 77, Sangju Sangmu's Lee Keun-ho misses with an attempt on goal.
Kim Woo-sung awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
Pohang Steelers's Song Min-kyu breaks free at Pohang Steel Yard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Sangju Sangmu goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu are pushing forward but Lee Keun-ho's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
In the minute 80, Sangju Sangmu apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Seon-min Moon. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Kim Woo-sung signals a free kick to Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Kim Woo-sung waits before resuming play because Ha Chang-rae for Pohang Steelers is still down.
In the minute 82, Lee Kwang-hyeok gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pohang Steelers.
Ha Chang-rae for Pohang Steelers is back on the field again.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pohang.
In the minute 83, Great shot from Sangju Sangmu's Jeong Jae-Hee but he is denied by the crossbar.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sangju Sangmu are coming forward and Seon-min Moon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Pohang Steelers goal kick.
Goal! The away team draw level at 3-3 through a header from Kim Min-hyeok.
Seon-min Moon instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Pohang Steelers in their own half.
Sangju Sangmu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Pohang Steelers.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Pohang.
Kang Sang-woo (Pohang Steelers) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Pohang Steelers capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sangju Sangmu's half?
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers at Pohang Steel Yard.
In Pohang a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Pohang Steelers close to the penalty box.
Pohang Steelers have been awarded a corner by Kim Woo-sung.
Can Pohang Steelers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sangju Sangmu's half?
In Pohang Sangju Sangmu attack through Seon-min Moon. The finish is off target, however.
Kim Woo-sung awards Pohang Steelers a goal kick.
Sangju Sangmu to take a throw-in in Pohang Steelers territory.
Ball safe as Sangju Sangmu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's 4-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Pohang Steelers make their third substitution with Jun jae Nam replacing Lee Kwang-hyeok.
Kang Sang-woo (Pohang Steelers) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! The home team take a 4-3 lead through Aleksandar Palocevic.
